summary: The Man Cave is a custom player abode (and my first creation kit mod) which I have meticulously put together to fit my character\'s needs. I decided to release it to the public because I believe it will fit your character\'s needs as well.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i109.photobucket.com/albums/n60/eagledude4/ScreenShot47.jpg[/IMG]

The Man Cave is a custom player abode (and my first creation kit mod) which I have meticulously put together to fit my character\'s needs. I decided to release it to the public because I believe it will fit your character\'s needs as well. 

To get The Man Cave, you must buy it through decoration purchasing for any of the 5 player homes. When you purchase The Man Cave (15000 coins), a trapdoor entrance will be placed in your player home, and an exit ladder will be placed in The Man Cave in the exit/entrance room.


[b][u]Contents[/u][/b]
An entrance/exit room consisting of:
[list]
[*]A ladder for every house you purchase The Man Cave for
[/list]

A guardian stone room consisting of:
[list]
[*]All 13 guardian stones
[/list]

A display room consisting of:
[list]
[*]All 8 dragon priest busts
[*]15 angled weapon displays
[*]10 flat displays (for displaying circlets and amulets)
[*]10 single wall weapon racks
[*]20 double wall weapon racks
[*]8 shield racks
[/list]

A storage room consisting of:
[list]
[*]5 storage chests
[*]All 10 shrines
[/list]

A training room consisting of:
[list]
[*]7 training dummies
[/list]

A mannequin room: consisting of:
[list]
[*]30 mannequins
[*]14  standing weapon racks (2 weapons per rack)
[/list]

A hunting room consisting of:
[list]
[*]A tanning rack
[*]2 storage chests
[*]Bear, wolf, and saber cat head mounts
[/list]

A black smith room consisting of:
[list]
[*]A whetstone
[*]A workbench
[*]A smelter
[*]A forge
[*]4 storage chests
[*]2 shelves with some iron stuff and blacksmith clutter
[/list]

A mining room consisting of:
[list]
[*]an iron ore vein
[*]a corundum ore vein
[*]an orichalcum ore vein
[*]a quicksilver ore vein
[*]a silver ore vein
[*]a gold roe vein
[*]a malachite ore vein
[*]a moonstone ore vein
[*]an ebony ore vein
[*]2 geode veins
[*]a chopping block
[/list]

An alchemy room consisting of:
[list]
[*]An alchemist\'s table
[*]1 storage chest
[*]A small shelf with some recipes, potions, spell tomes and a staff of healing hands.
[/list]

An enchanting room consisting of:
[list]
[*]An enchanting table
[*]A storage chest
[*]An open chest filled with empty common soulgems
[/list]

A library consisting of:
[list]
[*]12 cabinet bookshelves
[*]The Man Cave changelog (in book form)
[*]Two shelves to store quest related items in the library (Similar to the ones found in the Thieves Guild Headquarters
[*]A Barenziah Crown Statue to display a crown of Barenziah
[*]A Map display placement above the Barenziah Crown Statue
[/list]


[b][u]Future Updates:[/u][/b]
[list]
[*]Scripted flat display cases to hold amulets and circlets
[/list]


[b][u]Known Bugs:[/u][/b]
[list]
[*]Light Popping and shadow stripping
[*]Some lights show through walls (if the rooms are very close together)
[*]Slow cell initial loading
[*]Followers have issues navigating through the suspicious cabinets
[*]Mannequins sometimes spawn out of place
[*]Mannequins sometimes have a moving idle animation
[*]Items don\'t stay inside flat display cases (Use tcl in the console on the item to fix)
[*]Random Invisible walls
[*]Trapdoor entrances might not appear due to game save issues (read the included readme for soluton)
[/list]
As far as I know, these bugs are caused by game code and not my mod.

Also, the 60 lights decrease performance.


Please endorse my mod if you enjoyed it, and please post any comments/suggestions to help me make it even better!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]The Man Cave is also on the Skyrim Workshop [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=12731]Here[/url].[/b]

Also, check out my other mods!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14319]Better Item Sorting[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15107]Better Leveling Merchants and Speechcraft[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15462]Better Map Marker Placements[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15446]Better Follower Dialogue Priority[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17020]No More Mine Pests[/url]
author: eagledude4
